findings.message: Test code legitimately uses GetComponent/SetActive/Destroy for test setup and teardown
findings.resolution: APPROVED - Test code is exempt from production code patterns

rationale: Test files are intentionally exempt from anti-pattern rules. Tests need to create GameObjects, add components, and clean up - this requires GetComponent, SetActive, and Destroy. These patterns are forbidden in production Services/Core code but are necessary in test harnesses.
